faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about membership

questions.question: What if I don't need help during the year?
questions.answer: Your membership stays active and ready when you need it. Plus, you have access to the damage calculator, guides, and partner discounts all year.

questions.question: How is Interdomestik different from insurance?
questions.answer: We're not insurance. We're your protection club - legal and technical experts who work for you, not the insurer. Pay just â‚¬20/year plus success fee only when you win.

questions.question: How fast can I file a claim?
questions.answer: In 60 seconds! Call our 24/7 hotline or send a WhatsApp message. No forms, no waiting.

questions.question: What if I don't win the claim?
questions.answer: If we don't recover money for you, you don't pay a success fee. No Win, No Fee.

questions.question: Can I cancel my membership?
questions.answer: Yes! You have a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, get your money back. After that, you can cancel before renewal.
